title: EE takes on Amazon with its own kids edition tablet, the 4G EE Robin
text:
EE takes on Amazon with its own kids edition tablet, the 4G EE Robin 
Published By: Pocket-lint.com - Today 
EE has entered the family tablet market with a 4G-enabled device that is specifically designed for children and their parents. The EE Robin...
